Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires certain companies and corporations to report certain data regarding the gender, race and ethnicity of their employees
Summary: Requires certain companies and corporations to report certain data regarding the gender, race and ethnicity of their employees.
LawCode: Amd ยง408, BC L; amd ยง301, Lim Lil L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the business corporation law and the limited liability company law, in relation to requiring certain companies and corporations to report certain data regarding the gender, race and ethnicity of their employees
